snippet: The first half of Mitt Romney's response ("I don't discriminate") is the subject of a spirited debate.
abstract: The first half of Mitt Romney's response ("I don't discriminate") is the subject of a spirited debate.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney, when asked about what he had done to advance gay rights, replied, "I don't discriminate," and recalled his appointment of a gay man to his cabinet as governor of Massachusetts.

headline.main: Debate Fact Check: Romney on Gay Rights
